# isSelected

**Instance Property**

A Boolean indicating whether the item is currently selected.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSelected: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the item is selected or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when it is not.

## Managing the Selection and Highlight States

- **highlightState**: The highlight state currently applied to the item.
